title: God's Not Dead: Evidence for God....- Rice Broocks epub/mobi
description:
God's Not Dead: Evidence for God in an Age of Uncertainty - God's Not Dead: Evidence for God in an Age of Uncertainty - Rice Broocks epub/mobiepub/mobi

Paperback: 42 pages,Publisher: Thomas Nelson (26 Mar. 2015),ISBN-10: 0718037014

Rice Broocks outlines a roadmap that guides seekers to acknowledge the most basic truths of Christianity:


[*]There is overwhelming and exciting evidence for God’s existence
[*]The God who exists is indeed the God of the Bible
[*]God has revealed his nature through his Son, Jesus Christ

As shown during the movie, this is the original book on which the main character bases much of his debate points with the atheistic professor. Persuasive arguments crafted with tools borrowed from logic, science, and philosophy, as well as scripture, solidify the faith of the reader and provide starting points for discussions with skeptics.

Please seed. Thanks!
